snippet: The Nets held a nice-that-you’re-still-around news conference for the 7-footer Brook Lopez, who had been dangled as a piece in the Dwight Howard trade talks.
lead_paragraph: The Nets held a nice-that-you’re-still-around news conference for the 7-footer Brook Lopez, who had been dangled as a piece in the Dwight Howard trade talks.

headline.seo: Brook Lopez and Nets Are Happy With Each Other, for Now
headline.main: Lopez and Nets Are Happy With Each Other, for Now
headline.print_headline: Lopez and Nets Are Happy With Each Other, for Now
